episodes.title: Did They Ever Think They’d Get Caught? | Epstein Files
episodes.description:
Did the elites really believe they would never get caught?
In this clip, Billy Carson questions the mindset behind power, arrogance, and silence surrounding the Epstein files.

This moment highlights why so many believed no one would ever speak out — and why survivor voices matter now more than ever. The focus is not politics, but humanity, accountability, and truth.

👇 Comment your thoughts.
👍 Like & subscribe for more uncensored clips.

episodes.title: Epstein Survivor Speaks – Billy Carson on Truth, Trauma & Humanity | Epstein Files
episodes.description:
🔭 Epstein survivor Sharlene Rochard speaks in this powerful interview with Billy Carson, breaking silence on grooming, manipulation, and life after Epstein. This episode focuses on survivor testimony, trauma awareness, and why humanity must come before politics or power.

📘 In this deep conversation, an Epstein survivor Sharlene Rochard speaks openly about how recruitment happened, why names cannot legally be revealed, and how elite protection systems operate. Billy Carson addresses the bigger picture — accountability, justice, and the moral failure surrounding the Epstein files.

🧠 Topics covered include survivor trauma, grooming tactics, coercive control, legal risks, and the importance of protecting the next generation. When an Epstein survivor speaks, the focus must stay on victims, not distractions or sensationalism.

   @sharlenerochard  


📌 Topics in this video:

How Epstein recruited and groomed victims

Why survivors can’t name names

Trauma, healing, and recovery

Billy Carson on humanity vs power

The truth behind the Epstein files

👉 Subscribe for uncensored interviews, like the video, and comment your thoughts respectfully.

⏱️ TIMESTAMPS

00:00 – Epstein Survivor Speaks: Grooming Explained
02:50 – How Recruitment Really Happened
04:29 – “I Thought I Had a Job”
06:58 – Why Survivors Can’t Name Names
08:22 – Protecting Families & Children
17:44 – Billy Carson on Humanity
39:39 – “I Want to Believe in Humanity”
50:17 – Healing, Trauma & Moving Forward

episodes.description:
This video features my interview on CNN, with my Survivor Sister Lisa Phillips, discussing the Epstein Files Transparency Act and the importance of survivor voices in the fight for truth and accountability.

For years, the truth was sealed. This moment represents a step toward transparency and justice for survivors and the public.



#epsteinfilestransparencyact

episodes.title: Sharlene Rochard’s Speech on Capitol Hill - Epstein Files Transparency Act
episodes.description:
On November 18, 2025 I stood on Capitol Hill to speak as a survivor in support of the Epstein Files Transparency Act.
For years, the truth was hidden, sealed, and kept away from the public. This moment represents a historic step toward transparency, accountability, and justice.

I’m honoured to have shared my voice alongside other survivors and lawmakers fighting for change.
Thank you to everyone who continues to support this movement.
Justice delayed is justice denied.

#EpsteinFilesTransparencyAct #CapitolHill #SurvivorVoices #Justice

episodes.title: Public Service Announcement from Survivors of Jeffery Epstein
episodes.description:
@worldweus For five administrations, survivors of Jeffrey Epstein have been left in the dark, waiting for answers and accountability. After three decades, it’s finally time to bring the secrets out of the shadows. 

We are demanding the release of ALL the Epstein files. The time is now! Call your member of congress and tell them to VOTE YES on the Epstein Files Transparency Act. Take action at worldwithoutexploitation.org
